title: (x) Monocase Graphic-exchange Print logo - FF Disturbance {Florian, Jan E}
content:
Any takers on [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001720/http:/www.graphic-exchange.com/images/fonds/titre02print.gif), I did a search assuming it was spotted (or famous) but I failed, speaks a bit Gill to me ; thanks.

 [‹ (x) Looking for a vintage 30s script - similar to Trafton Script {Paul H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44017 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Juliane - Bâle" italic serif on the back of a boat - Times {Yves, Florian} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44014 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content:
Hi Allessandro,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/disturbance_5083.png)
  
this is [FF Disturbance Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001720/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_disturbance_ot/) by [Jeremy Tankard](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001720/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Jeremy%252BTankard).  
F
